data.title: Farm Toolrooom Restoration
data.subtitle: A complete project, from modeling to execution, to restore my family's farm toolroom. I've proposed some solutions after talk with the workers and my family trying to apply Design Thinking principles.

data.title: Juice Factory Layout Study
data.subtitle: After months observing some problems with the factory's layout, me and other two workmates decided to use Design Thinking principles to build a set of proposition to solve our complaints.

data.title: Bart, The White Beetle
data.subtitle: This old little boy, rescued by me and my father in the interior of Minas Gerais' state, earned us a lot of stories. In all of them, we got really dirty.

data.title: Moped 1st
data.subtitle: It was my first vehicle and the first combustion engine that I learned to fix.

data.title: Car Driving Simulator V3
data.subtitle: A cockpit controlled by an ATMEGA32 made by wood, junkyard pieces and bikes mechanisms to simulate the experiences of driving trucks and racing cars.

data.title: Tension Source from Scrap
data.subtitle: One of my first homemade experiments. I printed some tension source circuits with those PCB printing kits and put them into an old car radio.

data.title: 3D Printer
data.subtitle: I've bought an old and inoperative 3D printer for a bargain and restored it. Currently, I print my prototype's mechanical pieces and characters through this machine.

data.title: CPE's Sofa
